thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A hidden gem!
thread.title_full: A hidden gem! - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: krista p
title: A hidden gem!
text:
We stumbled upon this hotel while looking for a hotel that was near enough to the tourist areas and restaurants, but was also in a nice area, that was affordable (if here was such a place!). The decor is what caught my eye, very eclectic and industrial 20's, steampunk feel. So glad we chose this place! Perfect location, adorable place, and THE best breakfast! The rooms are very small ( it's Europe!), and the bed very firm ( but doable, with nice pillows). The staff were great too- we accidentally left our do not feature sign up so our room was not made up, and as soon as we asked for fresh towels, the manager himself came and cleaned our room for us. Impressive! We will definitely stay here again, felt intimate and safe, so happy with the experience!!
Room Tip: Ask for an upgrade, had room 312, has a patio with lounge chairs! See more room tips
